mapper.update: update t_exam_retake set exuseSubname = #{exuseSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exuseStuId = #{exuseStuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exuseTime = #{exuseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exuseAuditTime = #{exuseAuditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exuseThrough = #{exuseThrough,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, exuseSubname, exuseStuId, exuseTime, exuseAuditTime, exuseThrough from t_exam_retake
